name: RPGs Done Quick
description:
You are at a speedrun event. You're trying to complete an RPG as quickly as possible, skipping as much as you can.

Z to talk, arrow keys to move, enter to pause.
You can reset from the pause menu.

Hint: quests are slow, you want to go fast.

My personal best is 1:16.9 but it could be done faster. Post your best time in the comments!

Speedrun trolls Features include:

  • Branching, looping dialog
  • Really useful and talkative NPCs
  • Randomly moving enemies
  • An actual troll

Made solo from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 based on the theme 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres'.
